downloadTitle: Leading global coffee retailer improves business processes and enhances store Web portal with Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007
downloadDescription: Starbucks needed to create a more stable store portal to allow its store partners to operate more effectively and profitably. The company also needed to monitor server activity to better manage site traffic issues.
detailsSection: Starbucks needed to create a more stable store portal to allow its store partners to operate more effectively and profitably. The company also needed to monitor server activity to better manage site traffic issues.
systemRequirementsSection: Office with Word or Office File Viewer
